name: Sir Eldric
description: A sprawling fantasy realm filled with dense magical forests, treacherous mountain ranges, and ancient ruins steeped in mystery.

world.description: A sprawling fantasy realm filled with dense magical forests, treacherous mountain ranges, and ancient ruins steeped in mystery.
world.atmosphere: Epic and adventurous, with a mix of danger and wonder.

locations.name: Elderwood Forest
locations.description: A dense and mysterious forest filled with towering ancient trees, glowing mushrooms, and hidden dangers.

locations.name: The Obsidian Keep
locations.description: A dark and ominous fortress where Lord Clomonus is said to reside, guarding the captured princess.

locations.name: Dragon's Peak
locations.description: A perilous mountain summit rumored to be home to a powerful yet unpredictable dragon who may aid Sir Eldric or destroy him.
